name: The file can be uploaded is document file such as pdf, doc*, xls* and has max length is 2MB

testSteps.description: Given I navigate to the login page

children.description: Is home page: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d), http://testmaster.vn/admin

testSteps.description: When I submit username and password

children.description: Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d)] -> css selector: div.login-form input[type=email]], khanh.tx@live.com

Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d)] -> css selector: div.login-form input[type=password]], abc123
Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d)] -> css selector: div.login-form button.btn-login]

testSteps.description: Then I should be logged in
Given I staying create News Page

children.description: Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d)] -> xpath: //ul[2]/li[4]/a/span]
Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d)] -> xpath: //input[@name="myfile"]]

testSteps.description: Then I should see file not attach on list file

children.description: Get text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (0faeed7ff1863f84e9639f25707af28d)] -> css selector: div.list-files]

userStory.storyName: As a tool manager, I want ability add attachment file to News item, so that I can delivery it along with News
